tool_description:
You can access technical and store information of more than 13732+ video games. 
Playstation (PS1:212,PS2:1028,PS3:766,PS4:3182,PS5:1158)
PC (windows:10483, MacOS:3052, Linux:1959)
Xbox (Original:989,Xbox360:804,XOne:2803,XSeries:1062)
Nintendo Games (GameCube:398,Wii:256,WiiU:121,Switch:2909)
name: Evosis's Game Database
title: Evosis's Game Database

api_list.name: getGamesUpdatedLast24H
api_list.description:
Returns updated record ID, date time and update type.
**Update Types**
updateStore: Updated store sell status or added new store.
publish: Published today.
updateData: Updated platform, game engine, publisher information
updateTag: Updated name, series or release date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://evosiss-game-database.p.rapidapi.com/getGamesUpdatedLast24H"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "evosiss-game-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
